abstract: Amgen agrees to buy Onyx Pharmaceuticals for about $10.4 billion. | Muriel Siebert, the first woman to buy a seat on the New York Stock Exchange, has died at 80. | Inside New York’s investment houses, shoeshine service has proved remarkably resilient. | Pawnshops are looking to fill a void left by banks.
